actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of funds for the erection of a sculpture in memory of Dr. Robert H. Goddard, the Father of Modern Rocketry, on the grounds of Clark University.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of funds, not to exceed $100,000, to the Secretary of the Interior for erection of a sculpture in memory of Doctor Robert H. Goddard, the Father of Modern Rocketry, on the grounds of Clark University.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of funds for the erection of a sculpture in memory of Dr. Robert H. Goddard, the Father of Modern Rocketry, on the grounds of Clark University.
